verbs.description: [ARG0: Jimmy Kimmel] [V: kicked] off [ARG1: his monologue] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday night] [ARGM-MNR: by mocking President Trump and his announcement about withdrawing the U.S. from the Iran Nuclear Deal] .
